G

game - package game
 
Game - Class in game
Represents the main game window for the Bang Bang Simulation.
Game() - Constructor for class game.Game
Constructs a new Game instance.
GameController - Class in game
Act likes the brain of the game that it will manipulate(delete/update) JFRAME depending on the logic.
GameController(JFrame) - Constructor for class game.GameController
Constructs a new Controller panel.
generateShip() - Method in class components.Board
Generates ships for the board based on the dimension.
getCol() - Method in class components.Ship
Returns the column coordinate of the ship.
getColumn() - Method in class components.Coordinate
Retrieves the column value of the coordinate.
getLength() - Method in class components.Ship
Returns the length of the ship.
getRow() - Method in class components.Coordinate
Retrieves the row value of the coordinate.
getRow() - Method in class components.Ship
Returns the row coordinate of the ship.
